name: MetaSIZE
description:
Made in Godot Engine

A quick game made by daniellimws and I.

We worked on this over the course of a week for the Godot Wild Jam #36. We had a blast making the game, and we hope you enjoy it, as simple as it is.

The game follows a cancerous cell that constantly grows larger and larger as it tries to venture through it's host body to spread. Play around with the mechanics and try your best to get the fastest timings!

Update:

We published the source code here!
